divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside just listening to music in my car when i looked to the sky and i seen to the east of the sky there was a bright pulsating light turning blue red and white simultaneously then directly across from first ufo i seen a second pulsating light in the sky except this one was just white i watched it for a while and it didnt seem to move at all except for the second ufo it seemed to hover back and fourth across the sky and it seemed to get brighter i live right next to an airport and i see plenty of planes this was no plane i seen atleast 4 planes fly by these objects and i could tell that they were not planes and i have never seen this before. it was 12 o clock at night i observed the ufos from my front and back yard also my mother seen them. the sky was very clear there wasnt one cloud in the sky and i observed the objects very easily the first ufo stayed there for very long and still hasnt left and the second ufo has already left.
Summary: One UFO with a blue white and red light and another UFO with just one white light.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around
